LOCALE_TOO_SHORT: Locale must be at least {{min}} characters
LOCALE_TOO_LONG: Locale must be at most {{max}} characters
LANGUAGE_CODE_INVALID_LENGTH: Language code must be exactly {{length}} characters
LANGUAGE_CODE_INVALID_FORMAT: Language code must be lowercase letters
REGION_CODE_INVALID_LENGTH: Region code must be exactly {{length}} characters
REGION_CODE_INVALID_FORMAT: Region code must be uppercase letters
